actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-346.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.
Measure passed House, amended, roll call #528 (236-15).

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 2859, a bill to authorize appropriations for programs under the Domestic Volunteer Service Act of 1973, to amend such Act to facilitate the improvement of programs carried out thereunder, to authorize urban volunteer programs, and for other purposes.

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended, roll call #528 (236-15)) Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 2859 (Domestic Volunteer Service Act funding). Extends the time limitations for general debate from one hour to two hours.

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 2859, a bill to authorize appropriations for programs under the Domestic Volunteer Service Act of 1973, to amend such Act to facilitate the improvement of programs carried out thereunder, to authorize urban volunteer programs, and for other purposes.
